definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Crushing of granites; mining of coal, minerals embedded in siliceous rocks.
sentences.chinese: 花岗岩粉碎，采煤，硅酸盐矿石内植入矿物。

sentences.english: An overlay welding electrode without mineral powder (such as, slagforming medium, etc.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了无造渣剂等矿石粉的耐磨堆焊电焊条。

sentences.english: Gold recovery from arsenic-containing gold ore has been a major subject of flotation research.
sentences.chinese: 从含砷金矿石中回收金一直是浮选研究的重要课题。

sentences.english: This paper analyses several factors which influences the self - priming pump of the unloader of Ore Terminal .
sentences.chinese: 分析了影响矿石码头卸船机自吸泵的几个因素。

sentences.english: The research and application of pultrusion for continuous fiber reinforced thermoplastic composites;
sentences.chinese: 研究用陕西略阳玄武岩矿石原料生产连续纤维的工艺。

sentences.english: The mentioned technology can be used for producing yttrium concentrate from ore leaching liquor.
sentences.chinese: 采用这项技术可以从矿石浸出液制备钇富集物。

sentences.english: China's iron-ore import volumes actually fell in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 中国2010年铁矿石进口量反而下降。

sentences.english: The ore bearing wall rocks are composed mainly of siliceous phosphorites.
sentences.chinese: 与闪锌矿一起构成矿石的主要金属矿物。

sentences.english: Sphalerite is the main ore minerals.
sentences.chinese: 闪锌矿为主要的矿石矿物。

sentences.english: The ore was heated in the kilns to drive off water and carbonic acid gas.
sentences.chinese: 矿石被放入窑里加热，蒸发掉水和碳酸气。

sentences.english: The experiment on single silver ore and complete cyanide Leaching is studied.
sentences.chinese: 对单一银矿石进行了全泥氰化试验研究。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the processing experimental research of a eclogite-type rutile mine.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了某榴辉岩型金红石矿石的选矿试验研究。

sentences.english: Beijing has not said the detentions are tied to iron ore negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 北京方面并没有说拘留跟铁矿石谈判有关。

sentences.english: The determination method of gold in the ore and thiourea leaching solution has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了矿石及其硫脲浸取液中金的测定方法。

sentences.english: It looked perfect, like a hand-carved mineral Valentine.
sentences.chinese: 它的形状十分完美，像一颗手工雕刻的矿石爱心。

sentences.english: Rock People will find safety in the mineral kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 石头人会在矿石王国中找到安全感。
